verses.verse: And <S%H3254>again<s%> the <S%H639>anger<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> was <S%H2734>kindled<s%> against <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, and he <S%H5496>moved<s%> <S%H1732>David<s%> against <S%H559>them<s%>, saying, <S%H3212>Go<s%>, <S%H4487>number<s%> <S%H3478>Israel<s%> and <S%H3063>Judah<s%>.

And the <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H3097>Joab<s%> the <S%H8269>captain<s%> of the <S%H2428>host<s%>, who was with <S%H7751>him<s%>, Go now to and fro through all the <S%H7626>tribes<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, from <S%H1835>Dan<s%> even to <S%H884>Beer-sheba<s%>, and <S%H6485>number<s%> ye the <S%H5971>people<s%>, that I may <S%H3045>know<s%> the <S%H4557>sum<s%> of the <S%H5971>people<s%>.

And <S%H3097>Joab<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto the <S%H4428>king<s%>, Now <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> thy <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H3254>add<s%> unto the <S%H5971>people<s%>, how many <S%H1992>soever<s%> they may <S%H3967>be<s%>, a hundredfold; and may the <S%H5869>eyes<s%> of my <S%H113>lord<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H7200>see<s%> <S%H113>it<s%>: but why doth my lord the <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H2654>delight<s%> in this <S%H1697>thing<s%>?

Notwithstanding <S%H4428><s%>, the king's <S%H1697>word<s%> <S%H2388>prevailed<s%> against <S%H3097>Joab<s%>, and against the <S%H8269>captains<s%> of the <S%H2428>host<s%>. And <S%H3097>Joab<s%> and the <S%H8269>captains<s%> of the <S%H2428>host<s%> went <S%H3318>out<s%> from the <S%H6440>presence<s%> of the <S%H4428>king<s%>, to <S%H6485>number<s%> the <S%H5971>people<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>.

And they passed <S%H5674>over<s%> the <S%H3383>Jordan<s%>, and <S%H2583>encamped<s%> in <S%H6177>Aroer<s%>, on the right <S%H3225>side<s%> of the <S%H5892>city<s%> that is in the <S%H8432>middle<s%> of the <S%H5158>valley<s%> of <S%H1410>Gad<s%>, and unto <S%H3270>Jazer<s%>:

then they <S%H935>came<s%> to <S%H1568>Gilead<s%>, and to the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H8483>Tahtim-hodshi<s%>; and they <S%H935>came<s%> to <S%H1842>Dan-jaan<s%>, and round <S%H5439>about<s%> to <S%H6721>Sidon<s%>,

and <S%H935>came<s%> to the <S%H4013>stronghold<s%> of <S%H6865>Tyre<s%>, and to all the <S%H5892>cities<s%> of the <S%H2340>Hivites<s%>, and of the <S%H3669>Canaanites<s%>; and they went <S%H3318>out<s%> to the <S%H5045>south<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%>, at <S%H884>Beer-sheba<s%>.

And <S%H3097>Joab<s%> gave <S%H5414>up<s%> the <S%H4557>sum<s%> of the <S%H4662>numbering<s%> of the <S%H5971>people<s%> unto the <S%H4428>king<s%>: and there were in <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H8083>eight<s%> <S%H3967>hundred<s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%> <S%H2428>valiant<s%> <S%H376>men<s%> that <S%H8025>drew<s%> the <S%H2719>sword<s%>; and the <S%H376>men<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%> were <S%H2568>five<s%> <S%H3967>hundred<s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%> <S%H376>men<s%>.

And <S%H1732>David<s%>'s <S%H3820>heart<s%> <S%H5221>smote<s%> him <S%H310>after<s%> that he had <S%H5608>numbered<s%> the <S%H5971>people<s%>. And when <S%H1732>David<s%> rose <S%H6965>up<s%> in the <S%H1242>morning<s%>, the <S%H1697>word<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> came unto the <S%H5030>prophet<s%> <S%H1410>Gad<s%>, <S%H1732>David<s%>'s <S%H2374>seer<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>,

So <S%H1410>Gad<s%> <S%H935>came<s%> to <S%H1732>David<s%>, and <S%H5046>told<s%> <S%H559>him<s%>, and said unto <S%H7651>him<s%>, Shall seven <S%H8141>years<s%> of <S%H7458>famine<s%> <S%H935>come<s%> unto thee in thy <S%H776>land<s%>? or wilt thou <S%H5127>flee<s%> <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H2320>months<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> thy <S%H6862>foes<s%> while they <S%H7291>pursue<s%> <S%H7969>thee<s%>? or shall there be three <S%H3117>days<s%>' <S%H1698>pestilence<s%> in thy <S%H776>land<s%>? now <S%H3045>advise<s%> <S%H7200>thee<s%>, and consider what <S%H1697>answer<s%> I shall <S%H7725>return<s%> to him that sent <S%H7971>me<s%>.

And <S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H1410>Gad<s%>, I am in a <S%H3966>great<s%> <S%H6887>strait<s%>: let us <S%H5307>fall<s%> now into the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>; for his <S%H7356>mercies<s%> are <S%H7227>great<s%>; and let me not <S%H5307>fall<s%> into the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of <S%H120>man<s%>.

So <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> <S%H5414>sent<s%> a <S%H1698>pestilence<s%> upon <S%H3478>Israel<s%> from the <S%H1242>morning<s%> even to the <S%H6256>time<s%> <S%H4150>appointed<s%>; and there <S%H4191>died<s%> of the <S%H5971>people<s%> from <S%H1835>Dan<s%> even to <S%H884>Beer-sheba<s%> <S%H7657>seventy<s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%> <S%H376>men<s%>.

And when the <S%H4397>angel<s%> stretched <S%H7971>out<s%> his <S%H3027>hand<s%> toward <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%> to <S%H7843>destroy<s%> <S%H3068>it<s%>, Jehovah <S%H5162>repented<s%> him of the <S%H7451>evil<s%>, and <S%H559>said<s%> to the <S%H4397>angel<s%> that <S%H7843>destroyed<s%> the <S%H5971>people<s%>, It is <S%H7227>enough<s%>; now <S%H7503>stay<s%> thy <S%H3027>hand<s%>. And the <S%H4397>angel<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> was by the <S%H1637>threshing-floor<s%> of <S%H728>Araunah<s%> the <S%H2983>Jebusite<s%>.

And <S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H559>spake<s%> unto <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> when he <S%H7200>saw<s%> the <S%H4397>angel<s%> that <S%H5221>smote<s%> the <S%H5971>people<s%>, and <S%H559>said<s%>, <S%H2398>Lo<s%>, I have sinned, and I have done <S%H5753>perversely<s%>; but these <S%H6629>sheep<s%>, what have they <S%H6213>done<s%>? let thy <S%H3027>hand<s%>, I pray <S%H1>thee<s%>, be against me, and against my father's <S%H1004>house<s%>.

And <S%H1410>Gad<s%> <S%H935>came<s%> that <S%H3117>day<s%> to <S%H1732>David<s%>, and <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H5927>him<s%>, Go up, <S%H6965>rear<s%> an <S%H4196>altar<s%> unto <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> in the <S%H1637>threshing-floor<s%> of <S%H728>Araunah<s%> the <S%H2983>Jebusite<s%>.
And <S%H1732>David<s%> went <S%H5927>up<s%> according to the <S%H1697>saying<s%> of <S%H1410>Gad<s%>, as <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> <S%H6680>commanded<s%>.

And <S%H728>Araunah<s%> <S%H8259>looked<s%> <S%H7200>forth<s%>, and saw the <S%H4428>king<s%> and his <S%H5650>servants<s%> coming <S%H5674>on<s%> toward <S%H728>him<s%>: and Araunah went <S%H3318>out<s%>, and <S%H7812>bowed<s%> himself before the <S%H4428>king<s%> with his <S%H639>face<s%> to the <S%H776>ground<s%>.
